checks.name: CK_DM_Conversations_PartyOrder
checks.expression: ([party1_id]<[party2_id])

checks.name: CK_DM_Conversations_Positive
checks.expression: ([party1_id]>(0) AND [party2_id]>(0))

checks.name: CK_DMC_LastMsg_GE_Created
checks.expression: ([last_message_at] IS NULL OR [last_message_at]>=[created_at])

checks.name: CK_DM_Messages_ReadConsistency
checks.expression: ([is_read]=(1) AND [read_at] IS NOT NULL OR [is_read]=(0) AND [read_at] IS NULL)

checks.name: CK_Notification_Recipients_TargetOneOnly
checks.expression: ((case when [user_id] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end+case when [manager_id] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end)=(1))

checks.name: CK_Notifications_SenderOneOnly
checks.expression: ((case when [sender_user_id] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end+case when [sender_manager_id] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end)<=(1))

checks.name: CK_OrderInfo_Completed_Implies_CompletedAt
checks.expression: (([order_status]=N'已出貨' OR [order_status]=N'未出貨') AND [completed_at] IS NULL OR [order_status]=N'已完成' AND [completed_at] IS NOT NULL)

checks.name: CK_OrderInfo_OrderStatus
checks.expression: ([order_status]=N'已完成' OR [order_status]=N'已出貨' OR [order_status]=N'未出貨')

checks.name: CK_OrderInfo_OrderTotal_NonNegative
checks.expression: ([order_total]>=(0))

checks.name: CK_OrderInfo_Paid_Implies_PaymentAt
checks.expression: ([payment_status]=N'未付款' AND [payment_at] IS NULL OR [payment_status]=N'已付款' AND [payment_at] IS NOT NULL)

checks.name: CK_OrderInfo_PaymentStatus
checks.expression: ([payment_status]=N'已付款' OR [payment_status]=N'未付款')

checks.name: CK_OrderInfo_Shipped_Implies_ShippedAt
checks.expression: ([order_status]=N'未出貨' AND [shipped_at] IS NULL OR ([order_status]=N'已完成' OR [order_status]=N'已出貨') AND [shipped_at] IS NOT NULL)

checks.name: CK_OrderInfo_Timeline
checks.expression: (([payment_at] IS NULL OR [payment_at]>=[order_date]) AND ([shipped_at] IS NULL OR [shipped_at]>=isnull([payment_at],[order_date])) AND ([completed_at] IS NULL OR [completed_at]>=isnull([shipped_at],isnull([payment_at],[order_date]))))

checks.name: CK_Relation_UserOrder
checks.expression: ([user_id_small]<[user_id_large])

checks.name: CK_Support_Ticket_Assignments_NotSame
checks.expression: ([from_manager_id] IS NULL OR [from_manager_id]<>[to_manager_id])

checks.name: CK_Support_Ticket_Messages_Read_GE_Sent
checks.expression: (([read_by_user_at] IS NULL OR [read_by_user_at]>=[sent_at]) AND ([read_by_manager_at] IS NULL OR [read_by_manager_at]>=[sent_at]))

checks.name: CK_Support_Ticket_Messages_Sender_OneOnly
checks.expression: ((case when [sender_user_id] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end+case when [sender_manager_id] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end)=(1))

checks.name: CK_Support_Tickets_Close_Consistency
checks.expression: ([is_closed]=(1) AND [closed_at] IS NOT NULL OR [is_closed]=(0) AND [closed_at] IS NULL)

checks.name: CK_Support_Tickets_LastMsg_GE_Created
checks.expression: ([last_message_at] IS NULL OR [last_message_at]>=[created_at])
